main.py:
def back():
    Motor.motor_pulse(12, 0)
    Motor.motor_pulse(13, 1000)
    Motor.motor_pulse(14, 0)
    Motor.motor_pulse(15, 1000)
def run():
    Motor.motor_pulse(12, 1500)
    Motor.motor_pulse(13, 0)
    Motor.motor_pulse(14, 1500)
    Motor.motor_pulse(15, 0)
def right():
    Motor.motor_pulse(12, 0)
    Motor.motor_pulse(13, 0)
    Motor.motor_pulse(14, 1500)
    Motor.motor_pulse(15, 0)
def left():
    Motor.motor_pulse(12, 1500)
    Motor.motor_pulse(13, 0)
    Motor.motor_pulse(14, 0)
    Motor.motor_pulse(15, 0)
def brake():
    Motor.motor_pulse(12, 0)
    Motor.motor_pulse(13, 0)
    Motor.motor_pulse(14, 0)
    Motor.motor_pulse(15, 0)
def spin_left():
    Motor.motor_pulse(12, 2000)
    Motor.motor_pulse(13, 0)
    Motor.motor_pulse(14, 0)
    Motor.motor_pulse(15, 2000)
def spin_right():
    Motor.motor_pulse(12, 0)
    Motor.motor_pulse(13, 2000)
    Motor.motor_pulse(14, 2000)
    Motor.motor_pulse(15, 0)

def on_forever():
    if input.button_is_pressed(Button.A):
        run()
        basic.pause(1500)
        back()
        basic.pause(1500)
        left()
        basic.pause(1500)
        right()
        basic.pause(1500)
        spin_left()
        basic.pause(2000)
        spin_right()
        basic.pause(2000)
        brake()
basic.forever(on_forever)
